医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
DeNovix 发布新型经济实惠的 1 µL 紫外-可见分光光度计DeNovix 推出 DS-7 分光光度计，这是 DS 系列定量范围内的一款新型 1 uL 紫外-可见分光光度计。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/DeNovix-releases-new-budget-friend-1-c2b5L-UV-Vis-spectrophotometer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/DeNovix-releases-new-budget-friend-1-c2b5L-UV-Vis-spectrophotometer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3c7d2bb-1b27-4935-b450-d44a4fce2d9b Thu, 16 May 2024 03:18:00 -0400 DeNovix releases new budget-friendly 1 µL UV-Vis spectrophotometer
RedShiftBio 推出 Aurora TX：通过超灵敏微流体调制光谱和升温功能彻底改变 RNA 和蛋白质分析RedShiftBio 是创新生物物理表征和生物过程分析解决方案的领导者，在 2024 年 5 月 13 日在马萨诸塞州波士顿举行的蛋白质与抗体工程峰会 (PEGS) 上自豪地宣布推出 Aurora TX。 Aurora TX 是该公司最新、最先进的仪器，采用突破性的 MMS 技术，通过提供超灵敏、超精确的生物分子结构和稳定性测量，树立了生物分子分析的新标准，现在通过增加热升温功能而得到增强。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/RedShiftBio-launches-Aurora-TX-Revolutionizing-RNA-and- Protein-analysis-with-ultra-sensitive-microfluidic-modulation-spectroscopy-and-Thermal-斜坡能力.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/RedShiftBio-launches-Aurora-TX-Revolutionizing-RNA-and- Protein-analysis-with-ultra-sensitive-microfluidic-modulation-spectroscopy-and-Thermal-斜坡能力.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b807e21f-3202-4cdc-9abd-d0fe2a63c1ad Thu, 16 May 2024 03:11:00 -0400 RedShiftBio launches Aurora TX: Revolutionizing RNA and protein analysis with ultra-sensitive microfluidic modulation spectroscopy and thermal ramping capability
Nanoscribe 与 Advanced BioMatrix 合作，为 Quantum X 生物提供 4 种新型生物树脂Nanoscribe 和 Advanced BioMatrix 联手开拓生物打印领域，推出了四种专为基于双光子聚合 (2PP) 的 3D 打印而定制的先进生物树脂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Nanoscribe-partners-with-Advanced-BioMatrix-to-offer-4-new-bioresins-for-Quantum-X-bio.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Nanoscribe-partners-with-Advanced-BioMatrix-to-offer-4-new-bioresins-for-Quantum-X-bio.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d5a09a4-4fb5-4326-bd7b-cf8c3e57bca6 Thu, 16 May 2024 02:49:00 -0400 Nanoscribe partners with Advanced BioMatrix to offer 4 new bioresins for Quantum X bio
研究发现大脑对性欲低下的反应存在性别差异研究表明，患有性欲减退症（HDSS）的女性表现出“自上而下”的大脑抑制模式，而男性则不然，这表明大脑对性刺激的反应存在显着的性别二态性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Study-uncovers-sex-differences-in-brain-responses-to-low- Sex-desire.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Study-uncovers-sex-differences-in-brain-responses-to-low- Sex-desire.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b3cae31-8017-45a8-84f9-75c3a2ba34b3 Thu, 16 May 2024 00:53:00 -0400 Study uncovers sex differences in brain responses to low sexual desire
芬兰的严重交通伤害造成重大经济负担，直接成本在第一年内占主导地位研究估计了芬兰两年内严重交通伤害的总成本，结果表明直接成本占大部分，并且大多发生在受伤后的第一年内。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Severe-traffic-injuries-in-Finland-result-in-major-financial-burdens-with-direct-costs-dominate-within-the-first-年.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Severe-traffic-injuries-in-Finland-result-in-major-financial-burdens-with-direct-costs-dominate-within-the-first-年.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdf658c1-f3ad-4f00-ab96-8674540029c0 Thu, 16 May 2024 00:13:00 -0400 Severe traffic injuries in Finland result in major financial burdens, with direct costs dominating within the first year
互联网的使用会促进心理健康吗？发表在《技术、思维和行为》杂志上的研究发现，互联网接入和使用显着预测更高的心理健康状况，超过 96% 的案例显示，更高的互联网接入和使用程度与更高的心理健康状况相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Does-internet-use-boost-psychological-well-being.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Does-internet-use-boost-psychological-well-being.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8f459f0-2513-4a94-930d-0df931405b94 Wed, 15 May 2024 23:51:00 -0400 Does internet use boost psychological well-being?
新研究发现 17 个基因驱动克隆造血并与衰老和疾病相关研究人员在英国生物银行的一个大型队列中确定了 17 个用于克隆造血的新基因，揭示了它们对衰老和疾病风险的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/New-study-uncovers-17-genes-driven-clonal-hematopoiesis-and-links-to-aging-and-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/New-study-uncovers-17-genes-driven-clonal-hematopoiesis-and-links-to-aging-and-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82b33017-de0a-4a76-bce7-4cdad31c2268 Wed, 15 May 2024 23:34:00 -0400 New study uncovers 17 genes driving clonal hematopoiesis and links to aging and disease
人体血液中发现的微塑料：潜在的心血管威胁国际环境组织的一项研究发现，人类血液中存在微塑料聚合物，由于其尺寸和形状，引发了人们对心血管风险的担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Micro Plastics-found-in- human-blood-pottial-cardioangio-threat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Micro Plastics-found-in- human-blood-pottial-cardioangio-threat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f222ad68-d9eb-40fc-986f-28b06746d23b Wed, 15 May 2024 20:52:00 -0400 Microplastics found in human blood: potential cardiovascular threat
研究发现，COVID-19 与自身免疫性肺病的增加有关eBioMedicine 上的一项研究确定了 SARS-CoV-2 感染和 MDA5 自身免疫之间共有的免疫病理学，强调了 COVID-19 大流行期间 MDA5+ 病例和间质性肺疾病的激增。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/COVID-19-linked-to-rise-in-autoimmune-lung-disease-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/COVID-19-linked-to-rise-in-autoimmune-lung-disease-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b77f106-80a0-4677-88e3-cb231eddc25c Wed, 15 May 2024 20:21:00 -0400 COVID-19 linked to rise in autoimmune lung disease, study finds
研究发现抗肥胖药物可降低肥胖患者患心脏病的风险《肥胖》杂志上的一项研究评估了新型抗肥胖药物 (AOM) 对肥胖个体心血管疾病 (CVD) 的影响，发现这些药物可降低 CVD 并发症的风险，特别是心力衰竭和心房颤动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Anti-obesity-medications-slash-heart-disease-risk-in-obese-病人-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240515/Anti-obesity-medications-slash-heart-disease-risk-in-obese-病人-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49bd1b1a-ae35-4851-a909-fa41272c976c Wed, 15 May 2024 20:08:00 -0400 Anti-obesity medications slash heart disease risk in obese patients, study finds
